name: Gemini 2.5 Flash-Lite Preview (September 2025)
description: September 2025 checkpoint of Gemini 2.5 Flash-Lite with major efficiency improvements. 50% reduction in output tokens (and costs) and 40% faster than July 2025 release while maintaining quality.
notes: Preview released September 2025. Significant improvements: 50% fewer output tokens (reduced costs), 40% faster than July release. Optimized for cost and speed with thinking off by default. Supports optional thinking at different budgets, tool connections, multimodal input, and 1M token context. Pricing: $0.10/1M input, $0.40/1M output. Best choice for high-volume, cost-sensitive applications.
